short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click delete, archive, or unarchive all types message for a clutter-free conversation list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advantages:

Effortless Organization: Quickly manage your conversations with a single click, ensuring your message list is neat and organized.

Streamlined User Experience: Simplifies the process of deleting, archiving, or unarchiving multiple messages, saving you time and effort.

Clutter-Free Conversations: Keeps your conversation list tidy by easily removing unnecessary messages and archiving important ones, enhancing productivity.

Time-Saving: No need to manually select individual messages. Perform bulk actions in seconds to keep your conversations under control.

Improved Focus: By eliminating clutter, you can easily focus on important messages, reducing distractions in your conversation list.

No More Overwhelm: With one-click actions, you can quickly manage your message list without feeling overwhelmed by a growing conversation history.

Enhanced Efficiency: Whether for work or personal conversations, keep your messages organized without wasting time on repetitive tasks.

Simple UI: Enjoy a clean, intuitive interface that makes it easy to navigate and perform tasks without any complicated steps.



Note : This extension is not authorized by Facebook
